skill: Learning Guide: Learn The One Inch Punch

phases.name: preparation
phases.pose_hints: Set up your practice area and equipment. Review safety guidelines.
phases.rationale: Proper preparation ensures safe and effective practice.

phases.name: basic_technique
phases.pose_hints: Learn the fundamental movements slowly and with control.
phases.rationale: Building proper form is essential before adding speed or power.

phases.name: practice
phases.pose_hints: Repeat the movements with focus on accuracy and consistency.
phases.rationale: Repetition builds muscle memory and confidence.

phases.name: application
phases.pose_hints: Apply the skill in realistic scenarios or with variations.
phases.rationale: Real-world application tests understanding and adaptability.

constraints.workspace_hint: short to medium range combat movements
